page.title: 11Education and religion.
page.content: There are no schools in the area covered,but there are three just outside.These are only Junior and Infant schools,so older childrn must go to Stocksbridge School,or Penistone Grammar-which involves travelling quite a distance.Transport is usually by bus,or,for the lucky ones,car. There are no churches in this area either;anyone wishing to attend church must go to St,Mary's (Penistone), St.John's or St.Aidan's.However,the vicar of St.Mary's visits a mission in Hunshelf every two weeks.The congregation,which is Church of England,is drawn from local farmhouses,the population being too sparse to support a full time church.
